claims.object: Strong Reflection upon interaction with electromagnetic radiation

surface_layer.definition: Materials that allow electric current to flow easily.

deep_layer.mechanism: Excess mobile charge carriers (holes and/or electrons).
deep_layer.origin: Electronic configurations allow free movement of electrons
